numeric_cmp.desc: Compare numeric subject to a threshold given as string predicate (e.g., '>=3', '<=2'). Allowed prefixes: <=, >=, <, >, ==.

bool_eq.desc: Boolean equality test for condition keys mapping to True/False.

string_in.desc: Membership test when condition value is an array, e.g., {'wm_candidate': ['3.7','4.0']}

coercions.numbers: Strings like '3' and numeric JSON values are coerced to float then compared.
coercions.truthy: True/False only; strings are not auto-coerced.
